descriptions:
['DescriptionDistinct Real Estate  is pleased to offer this Studio apartment on high floor facing B.bay
8 Boulevard Walk features retail shops on the ground floor while podium level amenities includes a swimming pool, childrens pool, and fully equipped gymnasium. Secure parking is provided at the basement and podium levels.
As an integral part of Downtown Dubai, 8 Boulevard Walk residents become part of one of Dubais most happening lifestyle destinations. They live in close proximity to The Dubai Mall, the worlds largest shopping and entertainment destination.Further retail and leisure choices include Souk Al Bahar, a modern shopping mall which draws inspiration from Arabesque architectural elements. A major attraction is The Dubai Fountain, a captivating musical water spectacle and the worlds tallest performing fountain. Burj Park is a spectacular green heart of Downtown Dubai, where residents can unwind in the evenings or join family and friends to watch the spectacular Downtown Dubai New Years Eve Gala and other celebrations.
For More Details and Viewing Pls Call 055-202 2531-050-8990 775']

descriptions:
['DescriptionPrime Location & Hassle-Free Accessibility
Al Mamsha is strategically located just off MBZ Road in the heart of “New Sharjah” and just 2 minutes away from Sharjah International Airport, next to the University City of Sharjah, and 5 minutes from away from Emirate of Dubai.

The complex features a variety of modern and stylish facilities, including a podium level, kids playing area, swimming pool, nursery and gallery mall.
About Emirates Properties
Established in 1996, EMIRATES PROPERTIES is a market leader in international Residential Real Estate Services. Headquartered in Ajman, we specialize in providing professional services across the UAE. Our team of experts & professionals provide a full range of consultancy services for commercial & residential property. 
We appreciate the importance of developing long-term relationships with each of our clients, wherever they are on their property journey.']
